_header: Sir emperor dread ye no thing
_description: A fragment from a Caesar Augustus play — 12 lines in 8-line tail-rhyme stanzas

BodAsh750.First Lines:
Sire emperoure Dred ye no thyngeYff there be any ffrensche
                    gedling…
BodAsh750.Last Lines:
…Ofur to ye I wyll newea daggar þat ys gud &
                    fyne…
